plot: Real-Life Childhood Buddies & Sports Enthusiast, Barry Donovan (Barry D.) and Tommy Tallarino (Tommy T.) travel the Countryside in their Winnebago, in search of Sporting Events, from the mainstream to the most obscure.
plot_en: Real-Life Childhood Buddies & Sports Enthusiast, Barry Donovan (Barry D.) and Tommy Tallarino (Tommy T.) travel the Countryside in their Winnebago, in search of Sporting Events, from the mainstream to the most obscure.
plot_es: Real-Life Childhood Buddies & Sports Enthusiast, Barry Donovan (Barry D.) and Tommy Tallarino (Tommy T.) travel the Countryside in their Winnebago, in search of Sporting Events, from the mainstream to the most obscure.
title: The Sport Jerks
